item.title: UTLK - Chap12 - 随记
item.description: 以下为看 Understanding the Linux Kernel, 3rd Edition 一书的随手记录。 Linux manages to support multiple filesystem types in the same way other Unix variants do, through a concept called the Virtual Filesystem. The Role of the Virtual Filesystem (VFS) The Virtual Filesystem (also known as Virtual Filesystem Switch or VFS) is a kernel software layer that handles all system calls related to
